response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its quality and features, it's valued at $150 by me. Considering its worth to you, I propose we strike a deal at $120. This way, you get a great value for your money while I ensure a fair return for my investment. Let me know what you think!", "product_price": 120}
